# status

**Type**

The status of an auto-renewable subscription at the time the App Store signs the notification.

## Declaration

```swift
int32 status
```

## Discussion

This status value is current as of the `signedDate` in the decoded payload, [doc://com.apple.appstoreservernotifications/documentation/AppStoreServerNotifications/responseBodyV2DecodedPayload].

## App metadata and environment

- **appAppleId**: The unique identifier of an app in the App Store.
- **bundleId**: The bundle identifier of an app.
- **bundleVersion**: The version of the build that identifies an iteration of the bundle.
- **environment**: The server environment, either sandbox or production.
